charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for four months; recommendation that imprisonment be served in a Community Confinement Center, Transitions Incorporated-Ashland, KY; Supervised Release for 2 years; for a period of 120 days of supervison, beginning immediately upon release from custody, deft to remain at place of residence w/electronic monitoring; deft to pay cost of Home Confinement w/Electronic Monitoring; Special assessment of $50.00 for cts 1 &; 2 (total $100) (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:643 FAILING TO MAKE AN ACCOUNT OF PUBLIC MONEY (2)
